item.description:
Ok guys, here you are - a night at the pub! Thank you Sylvia for pushing me to arrange something! (hope this NEW date works - I had to switch from Friday 23rd to Thursday 22nd - hope you can still make it!) Excuse my lack of imagination but I'm going for O'Neills in Salem again as it's convenient and the best pub near me. Irish pub with Irish music on a Friday night and Sundays but I'm switching to Thursday this week as something came up for Friday that I need to do.... There's reasonably good bar food - fish and chips etc. etc. Good Guiness...come and join me for a beer and dinner (optional). 

Hope you will join me - please update your RSVP!

I will sit at the bar until I get a critical mass then we'll find a table..

Sorry for the last minute change of date.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me at the bar (if you are early) or in a booth if a bit later..
item.name: A night at the pub (by popular request..) CHANGED TO THURSDAY 22nd
